entry.title: krr-up/latex-style-comments
entry.summary:
A scaled down version of Torsten's comments style that is hopefully more compatible

Style to create marginpar comments

A scaled down version of Torsten's comments style that is hopefully more compatible. If it still messes up with the documents margins, try to use it with option noadjustmargins.

Pull requests for further improvements are welcome.
